document_data.name: Dispel Good
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dispel good''''' was an [[abjuration]] spell that worked exactly like ''[[dispel evil]]'' except it affected good spells and creatures instead of evil ones.
document_data.Effects: The effects of this spell were the same as ''[[dispel evil]]'' except the aura surrounding the spellcaster was dark and made of quivering unholy energy.
document_data.Components: Verbal and somatic components were required to cast this spell. The newest version also used the caster's (un)[[holy symbol]] or [[divine focus]], while the older versions required (un)holy water.
